name: Memory Path
description:
Memory Path.
Memorise the path, and follow it to the end.
Be quick before it disappears.

Three game modes,
- 50 Levels to complete
- Random levels , to see how good you are.
- Race Path, endless mode to see how far you can follow the path.

Collect coins for reaching the end of the path, and collect coins while seeing how far you can go.
Unlock characters, with collected coins.
Game Centre Leader board to challenge friends and the world.
